__e: Sir, I do not know when we will be able to come back.
You should change your mind. When you do, let me know.
Go home, repeat it, maybe it'll lodge.
Go back. Reunite with your crewmen. And consider what I have said.
Go home, repeat it, maybe it'll lodge.
I understand, but I urge you to reconsider in light of the following!
The counsel considers it, Probably wants to meet with you.
We should clean the slate and go over the whole thing once more.
I wanted to ask you to reconsider putting me on the football team.
